index.html.contents:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>
		<a-box position='0 5 -8' rotation='45 45 45' color='skyblue'></a-box>
		<a-cone position='2 4.5 -8' scale='0.5 1 0.5' color='plum'></a-cone>
		<a-torus position='-3 4.5 -8' rotation='10 30 0' color='pink'></a-torus>
		<a-sphere position='-2 1 -8' color='gold'></a-sphere>
		<a-cylinder position='1 1 -8' scale='1 2 1' color='lightgreen'></a-cylinder>
	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>
		<a-entity position='0 0 -5'>
			<a-cone position='0 4.5' scale='1.3 3 1.3' color='crimson'></a-cone>
			<a-cylinder position='0 1.5 0' scale='1 3 1' color='gold'></a-cylinder>
			<a-box position='0 2 0.5' scale='0.6 1 1d' color='silver'></a-box>
		</a-entity>

		<a-circle rotation='-90 0 0' scale='100 100 1' color='grey'></a-circle>
	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>

		<a-circle radius="25" color='silver' rotation="-90 0 0"></a-circle>

		<a-gltf-model position="0.5 0 -5" rotation="0 -45 0" scale='0.04 0.04 0.04'
			src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/imding/imding.github.io/master/temp/scene.gltf"></a-gltf-model>

	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>
		<a-torus position='0 1.5 -3' color='skyblue'
			animation='property: rotation; from: 0 0 0; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; easing: linear; dur: 2000'></a-torus>
	</a-scene>

	<a-camera>
		<a-cursor></a-cursor>
	</a-camera>
</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.2/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>
		<a-torus position='0 1.5 -3' color='skyblue'
			animation='property: rotation; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; easing: linear; dur: 2000'
			animation__color='property: components.material.material.color; type: color; to: red; dir: alternate; loop: true'
			animation__move='property: scale; to: 0.5 0.5 0.5; loop: true; dir: alternate'></a-torus>

	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.2/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>
		<a-box position="-2 0 -4" color="#EF2D5E" rotation="45 45 45" scale="0.5 0.5 0.5"
			animation="property: scale; from: 0.5 0.5 0.5; to: 1 1 1; startEvents: click; dur: 1000">
		</a-box>
	
		<a-sphere position="-1 2 -4" scale="0.5 0.5 0.5" color="#228E22"
			animation="property: position; from: -1 2 -4; to: 1 2 -4; startEvents: click; dur: 1000">
		</a-sphere>
	
		<a-cylinder position="1 0 -4" rotation="-90 0 0" scale="0.5 0.1 0.5" color="#4CC3D9"
			animation="property: rotation; from: -90 0 0; to: -90 360 0; startEvents: click; dur: 1000">
		</a-cylinder>
	
		<a-camera>
			<a-cursor fuse="true" fuse-timeout="150"></a-cursor>
		</a-camera>
	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>
		<a-box
			animation__click="property: rotation; startEvents: click; dur: 1000; to: 0 180 0"
			animation__mouseleave="property: rotation; startEvents: mouseleave; dur: 1000; to: 0 0 0"
			position='0 1 -3' color='lightblue'></a-box>

		<a-camera >
			<a-cursor
				position='0 0 -0.01'
				scale='0.01 0.01 0.01'
				animation__click="property: components.material.material.color; type: color; startEvents: click; dur: 0; to: green"
				animation__fusing="property: components.material.material.color; type: color; startEvents: fusing; dur: 0; to: red"
				animation__mouseleave="property: components.material.material.color; type: color; startEvents: mouseleave; dur: 0; to: black"
				fuse="true" fuse-timeout="1000" far="1"></a-cursor>
		</a-camera>
	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
	<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/randomcolor@0.5.4/randomColor.min.js"></script>
	<script src="script.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene id='scene'>
		<a-entity position='0 0.8 -3'>
			<a-cylinder id='button' scale='0.3 0.2 0.3' color='tomato' position='0 0.6 0'></a-cylinder>
			<a-cylinder radius='0.35' color='silver' position='0 0.05 0'></a-cylinder>
			<a-box id='box' color='gold'></a-box>
		</a-entity>

		<a-camera>
			<a-cursor position='0 0 -0.01' scale='0.01 0.01 0.01'
				animation__click="property: components.material.material.color; type: color; startEvents: click; dur: 0; to: green"
				animation__fusing="property: components.material.material.color; type: color; startEvents: fusing; dur: 0; to: red"
				animation__mouseleave="property: components.material.material.color; type: color; startEvents: mouseleave; dur: 0; to: black"
				fuse="true" fuse-timeout="1000" far="1"></a-cursor>
		</a-camera>
	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
</head>

<body>
	<a-scene>

		<a-entity position='0 1 -5'>
			<a-entity position='0 1.5 0.2'
				animation='property: rotation; to: 0 0 360; easing: linear; loop: true; dur: 1500'>
				<a-sphere color='pink' radius='0.2'></a-sphere>
				<a-circle color='lightgreen' radius='2' theta-length='20' side='double' rotation='0 0 0'></a-circle>
				<a-circle color='lightgreen' radius='2' theta-length='20' side='double' rotation='0 0 60'></a-circle>
				<a-circle color='lightgreen' radius='2' theta-length='20' side='double' rotation='0 0 120'></a-circle>
				<a-circle color='lightgreen' radius='2' theta-length='20' side='double' rotation='0 0 180'></a-circle>
				<a-circle color='lightgreen' radius='2' theta-length='20' side='double' rotation='0 0 240'></a-circle>
				<a-circle color='lightgreen' radius='2' theta-length='20' side='double' rotation='0 0 300'></a-circle>
			</a-entity>
			<a-cylinder color='dodgerblue' scale='0.1 3 0.1'></a-cylinder>
		</a-entity>
		
	</a-scene>
</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
	<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aframe-physics-system@4.0.1/dist/aframe-physics-system.js"></script>
	<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aframe-physics-extras@0.1.3/dist/aframe-physics-extras.js"></script>
	<script src='script.js'></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene>

		<a-box color='lightblue' destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='-2 0 -3'></a-box>
		<a-box color='lightblue' destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='0 0 -3'></a-box>
		<a-box color='lightblue' destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='2 0 -3'></a-box>
		<a-box color='lightblue' destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='4 0 -3'></a-box>

		<a-sphere id='sphere' static-body physics-collider
			position='-5 0 -3'
			color='tomato'
			animation='property: position; to: 5 0 -3; dur: 2000; easing: linear; delay: 2000'></a-sphere>
		
		<a-camera position="0 0 2" look-controls="pointerLockEnabled: true">
			<a-text id='scoreText' color='black' value='Boxes: 0' scale='0.008 0.008 0.008' position='-0.003 0.006 -0.01'></a-text>
			<a-cursor></a-cursor>
		</a-camera>

	</a-scene>

</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
	<script src="https://cdn.rawgit.com/donmccurdy/aframe-physics-system/v3.1.2/dist/aframe-physics-system.min.js"></script>
	<script src='script.js'></script>
</head>

<body>

	<a-scene physics='debug: true'>
	
		<a-sphere dynamic-body position="0 5.25 -5" radius="1.25" color="#EF2D5E"></a-sphere>
	
		<a-box dynamic-body position="-1 3.5 -3" rotation="0 45 0" width="1" height="1" depth="1" color="#4CC3D9"></a-box>
	
		<a-cylinder dynamic-body position="1 2.75 -3" radius="0.5" height="1.5" color="#FFC65D"></a-cylinder>
	
		<a-box static-body position="0 0 -4" scale='20 1 20' color="#7BC8A4"></a-box>
	
		<a-sky color="#ECECEC"></a-sky>

		<a-camera>
			<a-sphere static-body radius='0.5'></a-sphere>
		</a-camera>
	
	</a-scene>


</body>

</html>
